page.title: 14SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: Thursday Afternoon Playgroup. We interviewed parents,children and teacher in charge.All three enjoyed the group,suitable for babies up to school age.Parents thought it helped the children to learn.It has a toy lending library.It gives the children a chance to mix and helps them get used to school.Home Owners -New Barratt Estate -Occupants liked the property.it was modern had plenty of room,l8 yrs warranty,in the country yet near to town-large gardens room to extend fitted kitchens.Families of 2 or more children from various places,Bolton, Leeds,Australia.Local shops-Fri,Sat busiest days.Open 9am-5.30pm.Many shop daily,some weekly a few monthly.Reports of burglaries and petty crime from many shopkeepers.Chorley-People interviewed liked Chorley-its good bus service, friendly people,parks and countryside.
